name: rower
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who rows a boat, especially as a sport: He is a former Olympic rower. Five million watched the rowers win gold. See
row
More examplesFewer examplesWe watched the rowers on the river.She was a champion rower at Cambridge University.The British rowers were rescued after their boat capsized.
